title: Number of earthquakes in Italy 2018 - 2019 , by magnitude
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Magnitude, and Number of earthquakes in each Magnitude on the y axis.
The maximum Number of earthquakes 21869.0 is found at Magnitude Magnitude 0+ and the minimum is found at Magnitude 5.5+ where Magnitude is 0.0.
The difference of Number of earthquakes between the highest and lowest Magnitude is 21869.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 5 number of Magnitudes.
The Number of earthquakes is highest at Magnitude Magnitude 0+ and lowest at Magnitude Magnitude 5.5+.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Magnitude, and Number of earthquakes in each Magnitude on the y axis.
The maximum Number of earthquakes 21869.0 is found at Magnitude Magnitude 0+ and the minimum is found at Magnitude 5.5+ where Magnitude is 0.0.
The difference of Number of earthquakes between the highest and lowest Magnitude is 21869.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Magnitude, and Number of earthquakes in each Magnitude on the y axis.
The maximum Number of earthquakes 21869.0 is found at Magnitude Magnitude 0+ and the minimum is found at Magnitude 5.5+ where Magnitude is 0.0.
There is a difference of 21869.0 between the maximum Magnitude Magnitude 0+ and minimum Magnitude Magnitude 5.5+.
Magnitude Magnitude 0+ is higher than any other Magnitudes with value 21869.0, followed by Magnitude 2+, and Magnitude 3+. Down to Magnitude Magnitude 5.5+ with the lowest value 0.0.
The average Number of earthquakes in all 5 Magnitudes is 4899.8.
The Number of earthquakes is 24499.0 if we add up values of all Magnitudes.
